column4: (She checks your gag.)  Gags are such a perfect fit for prisoners.
(A maid steps in carefully, escorted by guards.)  I've heard you're dangerous Miss DialogPlayerName.  Don't hurt me, I'm here to release you.
(A maid steps in slowly, escorted by guards.)  You're Miss DialogPlayerName from the Bondage Club?  I'm here to release you.
(A maid steps in, escorted by a guard.)  You're the prisoner from the Bondage Club?  I'm here to release you.
(A maid steps in carelessly, escorted by a guard.)  Hello there, I'm here to release you.
(She nods.)  Yes Miss.  I will escort you out of the buidling when you're ready.
(She giggles.)  Well you can stay for a few more minutes, there's no hurry.
(She nods, helps you out and escorts you out of Pandora's Box.)  I trust you've learned your lesson.
(She sighs, helps you out and escorts you out of Pandora's Box.)  I trust you've learned your lesson.
(She helps you out and escorts you out of the building.)  I trust you've learned your lesson.
(She helps you out and escorts you out of the building.)  I trust you've learned your lesson.
(She helps you out and escorts you out of the building.)  I trust you've learned your lesson.
We will mail them to you.  Some fresh air will be an extra lesson.  You better run.  (She giggles.)

column3: Lesson learned, I won't get caught again.
You will understand the next lesson.
